body.name: CORSAIR H150i RGB Elite Liquid CPU Cooler - 360mm AIO - AF120 Elite PWM Fans - Intel® LGA 1700, 1200, 2066, AMD® AM5 & AM4 Sockets - White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 32 mins
FREE delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 10 hrs 17 mins
features: Advanced All-in-One CPU Cooling: Offers everything needed to keep your latest Intel or AMD CPU running at peak performance, while curbing the heat of even high-end processors.
Modern Pump Head Design and 16 RGB LEDs: Contemporary pump head design, with 16 individually addressable diffused RGB LEDs, provides a unique look and stunning lighting effects.

Cutting-Edge Cooling Performance: Elevate your CPU performance with liquid cooling driven by three 120mm CORSAIR AF ELITE Series AirGuide fans, delivering powerful PWM-controlled airflow between 400 and 1,850 RPM.

Unite Your Setup: Powerful CORSAIR iCUE software enables you to control and synchronize your cooler’s RGB lighting with all iCUE compatible devices, monitor CPU and coolant temperatures, and adjust fan and pump speeds.
Specialized Cooling Modes for Quiet Operation: Zero RPM fan and Variable Pump Speed specialized cooling modes in iCUE keep noise to a minimum when your system is idle or under light loads.
body.description: The CORSAIR iCUE H150i RGB ELITE Liquid CPU Cooler offers powerful CPU cooling, integrated RGB lighting, and refined aesthetics. CORSAIR AF ELITE Series PWM fans deliver powerful airflow and specialised low-noise cooling modes. With 16 individually addressable RGB LEDs on a modern pump head design, the H150i RGB ELITE delivers great cooling with looks to match. Powerful CORSAIR iCUE software enables you to create vivid lighting effects, monitor CPU and cooling temps, and adjust fan speeds. Zero RPM fan mode and Variable Pump Speed modes precisely regulate noise levels for quiet operation. With a thermally optimized copper cold plate and easy installation on the latest CPU brackets, the H150i RGB ELITE delivers first-class CPU cooling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this to replace an air cooler on my 2nd PC that’s right on my desk about 2-3 feet away from me. It’s on a i7 13700k 5.4ghz all core 4.3ghz e core. Hitting 90c under full load 260watts. I added this cooler and I instantly like the quality of the radiator. The paint looks and feels good. The sleeves on the water tubes are nice and the USB connection for the power is sleek looking and not an eyesore. I like the fans they run well but are not annoying loud. They do get loud but it’s only at 300watts full load. Now my CPU is at 5.6ghz all core 4.5ghz e core and it runs great. While gaming this has dropped my gaming temps by 10-20c depending on the load and the water pump is not loud. I’ve had about 4 AIO and this is the best quality ones I have seen. Also to note the pump seems to run cooler then my older AIO’s

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great AIO, and quiet
reviews.reviewText: Works great and looks just as good! wish the fans that it came with were rgb but no big deal, fans are quiet, the pump has been great no issues at all. CPU temps have been quite stable. i used the pre applied thermal paste as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, just hard to install
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this since september and I absolutely love it, I cried installing it though because it was definitely a pain. I should’ve put my own thermal paste on at the start and it started to get hot fast so I changed the thermal paste and it works way better now. Looks so good in my build

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My air cooler from my Ryzen 3600 was hitting 65°C+ idle to 90°C+ regularly when gaming so I went for an AIO. Chose this for looks and decent rep from people I know. I rarely go above 70°C under heavy load which is pretty comfortable. I am using the factory applied paste so I could probably get better temps with some tubes I have but haven't bothered. Games like Borderlands 3, Tiny Tina's Wonderlands, Overwatch, all at 144fps G-Sync, and even rendering videos captured from shadowplay in Filmora.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It arrived warped. Could not install and had to return.
reviews.reviewText: I love Corsair. It’s a trusted brand. I hate to leave bad reviews but I feel there should have been more quality control in place to prevent this from happening. It arrived warped as you can see from the photo. Had to return it and went to Best Buy instead. I was in the middle of building my PC and needed the part asap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My last water cooler was a corsair h105 from about 2013 and lasted me al the way to 2023 but I changed my motherboard and cpu and I could no longer carry over the h105 so I bought this one instead I'm very impressed by the build quality on this cooler, everything was perfectly packaged, no bent fins, was surprised on how many cables it has, my old one just had a power connector and the fan pins. Also appreciate the fillport on the side, my old one didn't have this fill port, the only way to fill it up was to remove the copper plate and carefully add water, then close it back up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect product, as described and works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good AIO with touchy software
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love the way this AIO looks and preforms pretty good. Easy to install for AMD CPUs and keeps my 7800x3D cool when gaming. My CPU sits at around 45c when idle and when playing starfield getting around 33 to 59% cpu usage it sits around 58c with it going up to 65c when loading new areas or systems. I also only had one issue while using this AIO and it was when it stopped detecting it in iCUE when I installed a lian li strimer plus v2 24 pin cable. A simple uninstall and reinstall of iCUE fixed my detection errors tho. Do recommend if you are doing a mild RGB build like me and dont want every single part in your PC to have RGB or over the top RGB

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen All in One de Corsair
reviews.reviewText: Esta muy bien, fácil de instalar, con toda la tornillería, no hay instrucciones pero es bastante obvio como funciona

reviews.reviewTitle: Beaucoup plus bruyant que ce que j'aurais pensé.
reviews.reviewText: Le montage n'est pas compliqué, mais nécessite de prendre son temps, avec une pate thermique de qualité j'obtiens des résultats sur un Ryzen 7 7800x3D juste acceptable en terme de températures (40° idle / 76° full charge), et une nuisance sonore en pleine charge vraiment audible.Je ne regrette pas mon achat, mais compte tenue de son prix je m'attendait clairement à mieux.

reviews.reviewTitle: Enfria tanto que he tenido que comprar una estufa para que no haga frio en mi cuarto gamer pa jero
